alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Western Rutland; Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 5:52PM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A line of showers with gusty winds will impact portions of Rutland and central Windsor Counties through 630 PM EST... At 550 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers with gusty winds near Lake George Village, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rutland, Chester, Woodstock, Killington, Ludlow Village, Rutland City, Wallingford, Rutland - Southern Vermont Airport, Plymouth, Chittenden, West Rutland, Ira, West Castleton, Mount Holly, Poultney Village, Mount Tabor, Shrewsbury, Danby, Lake St. Catherine and Bridgewater. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
